body.p: Kentucky, merchant, soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Blanton in 1844. Father of Edmund Haynes Taylor. Married to Sarah A. Moreland in Mobile, Alabama, in 1864. Served as a First Lieutenant in the Mexican-American War. Merchant in Franklin County, Kentucky in 1850. Merchant in Nashville, Tennessee in 1860. Commissioned Lieutenant Colonel in the Kentucky 1st Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) on July 3, 1861. Promoted to Colonel on October 14, 1861, Promoted to Brigadier-General on November 4, 1862. Assigned to Department of the Gulf in Mobile, Alabama on September 16, 1864.
